title: BlackRock, Blackstone Pressed to Detail AI-Driven Energy Profits
description: Recent takeovers of public utilities by BlackRock Inc. and Blackstone Inc. are drawing scrutiny from Democratic US senators, who are asking the firms to show whether they’re profiting from rising energy demands at consumers’ expense.
